ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the study treatment
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the study treatment infusion rate?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form  Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record the Rate of Infusion (e.g., if rate is 10 mL/min. Record 10 as the infusion rate).

ReferenceDocuments.name: SUPPEX.QVAL
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. This information could be submitted in a SUPPEX dataset as the value of SUPPEX.QVAL where SUPPEX.QNAM = "EXFLRT" and SUPPEX.QLABEL= "Infusion Rate". Refer to the current SDTM and SDTMIG for instructions on placement of non-standard variables in SDTM domains.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: Infusion rate can be used to derive dose.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDISC Aligned NCI Standard Equivalent CDE
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is to be used for CDISC aligned data collection in place of CDE 2475888 from the original NCI Standard CRF Template.
